response.overview: Whispers of Walls follows the story of Sethu and his lover, who find themselves trapped between love and the rigid walls of caste. she pleads with Sethu to leave the village, convinced that no one here will ever change. But Sethu, deeply tied to his land and identity, refuses to abandon the place . Seeking support, he turns to his brother-like friend Siva, who urges him to move away for a while, though Sethu is not convinced. In the end, Sethuâ€™s trust is shattered when Siva betrays him, choosing caste over friendship. the film explores how love, loyalty, and dreams collapse under the weight of tradition and betrayal, leaving only the silent whispers of walls as witnesses to the tragedy.
response.title: whispers of walls
